tag.name: maintenance tags
tag.description: These tags are used for maintenance.

tag.name: original work
tag.description: What the anime is based on! This is given as the original work credit in the OP. Mostly of academic interest, but a useful bit of info, hinting at the possible depth of story.

tag.name: elements
tag.description: Next to Themes setting the backdrop for the protagonists in anime, there are the more detailed plot Elements that centre on character interactions: "What do characters do to each other or what is done to them?". Is it violent Action, an awe-inspiring Adventure in a foreign place, the gripping life of a Detective, a slapstick Comedy, an Ecchi Harem anime, a SciFi epic, or some Fantasy travelling adventure?

tag.name: new
tag.description: Not based on anything, the story is a new work, usually made up by the people involved in creating the anime. Generally if an original work (原作) credit is given, it will be to the studio, or director, or other members of the production team.

tag.name: horror
tag.description: The horror cinematic genre is characterized by the attempt to make the viewer experience dread, fear, terror, or horror. Often their plots involve the intrusion of an evil force, event or personage, sometimes of supernatural origin, on the mundane world and the consequences thereof.

tag.name: DESCRIPTION MISSING
tag.description: The description for this entry is missing. e.g plot, biography... Please help by adding it, and remove this tag afterwards. Thank you.

tag.name: short episodes
tag.description: Short episodes are regular episodes that are much shorter than the standard length. This means up to and including 10 minutes; shows with episodes that are 11 to 20 minutes in length are http://anidb.net/t6494 [half-length episodes] instead. Not to be confused with http://anidb.net/t6349 [multi-segment episodes], which are regular episodes that are split into several short segments (parts), usually with separate titles and independent storylines.

tag.name: technical aspects
tag.description: It may sometimes be useful to know about technical aspects of a show, such as information about its broadcasting or censorship. Such information can be found here.

tag.name: speculative fiction
tag.description: Speculative fiction is an umbrella genre encompassing fiction with certain elements that do not exist in the real world, often in the context of supernatural, futuristic or other imaginative themes. This includes, but is not limited to, science fiction, fantasy, superhero fiction, horror, utopian and dystopian fiction, fairytale fantasy, supernatural fiction, as well as combinations thereof. Source: Wikipedia

episode.title: 奉沼
Swamp Offering
Houjou
episode.summary: Haruko moves to a village in the countryside to live with her new husband`s family, On the way, he tells her about a custom in the village that requires its residents to toss their most prized possessions into a swamp. Shortly after they arrive at his family`s home, Haruko is forced to join in this ritual with the rest of the villagers... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 風知
The Wind`s Warning
Fuuchi
episode.summary: Hideaki is a salaryman who lives alone in a company housing unit. One night, when he returns from the office, he hears the wind blowing through the open balcony door. Memories of a tragic event one month ago then take over Hideaki`s mind... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 友無洞
Tomonashi Cave
Tomonashidou
episode.summary: A group of high school students is visiting a certain cave on a field trip. A small group of them enters a corridor leading away from the main cave... but one of them, Tomoko, is ultimately left alone. After a few moments, she hears the screams of her classmates from deep inside the cave... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雷客
Thunderous Visitor
Raikyaku
episode.summary: Thunder rumbles on a stormy night. At a certain house where Ryousuke, a high school boy is currently home alone, the phone rings just moments after the power goes out. Then a flash of lightning displays the shape of a person outside the window... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 海籤
Sea Fortunes
Umikuji
episode.summary: On a certain remote island, a group of concerned fishermen surround Chisato, a young woman trembling in fear. What could have happened to her? Eventually, she tells the terrifying story, which started when she drew a fortune from a certain shrine... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 蛙卵
Frog Eggs
Kaeru no Tamago
episode.summary: Takuya is a very shy boy who has moved out to the countryside to live with his grandfather. Takuya felt he didn`t belong anywhere in Tokyo, and even here, he still doesn`t fit in with the local kids and continues to fear the eyes of strangers. One day, Takuya stumbles upon a cluster of frog eggs and finds them strangely fascinating... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 咲暗
Sakura
Sakura
episode.summary: Shouta has been admitted to a hospital in the countryside after a car accident. He finds himself regularly conversing through the wall with two children in the room next to his. Eventually these conversations leave Shouta with a sense of fear... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 雫来
The Dripping
Shizuku
episode.summary: Shimada, a salaryman, stops by a convenience store on his way home from work. It suddenly starts to rain, and he doesn`t have an umbrella, so he "borrows" one that he finds on the umbrella rack. But as he walks along with the umbrella open, he senses a darkness approaching from behind... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 滝落
Waterfall Drop
Takioto
episode.summary: Yurika is traveling with her friends from college. The group finds themselves at a waterfall deep in a forest that wasn`t mentioned in their guidebook, and they hear what sounds like objects falling over the roar of the water... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 覚氷
Frozen Memories
Kakuhyou
episode.summary: Shirou is climbing a mountain when he gets caught in a severe blizzard and takes shelter in a nearby shack. The blizzard worsens, and Shirou braces himself to wait it out. But soon, disturbing sounds fill the shack, bringing terror he never expected... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 無邪樹
Tree of Innocence
Mujaki
episode.summary: Twin boys, Takashi and Satoshi, are playing in a forest. The energetic Takashi talks the shy Satoshi into climbing a large tree, but as they do, Satoshi recalls something that had vanished from his memory... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 泥戯
Mud Games
Deigi
episode.summary: Mika drives through the rain to pick up her daughter, Michiko, from day care. She tries to talk with Michiko on the way home, but as their conversation carries on, Mika remembers something horrifying... Source: crunchyroll

episode.title: 山曳呼
Echoes
Yamabiko
episode.summary: Two young women, Eriko and Shiho, are climbing a mountain. Shiho is having a great time hearing her own voice echo in the mountains, but Eriko just wants to enjoy the view in peace. Then a man`s voice breaks through the still air, and the echoes Eriko and Shiho hear suddenly bring a sense of fear... Source: crunchyroll
